kpi.name: RNC_791a
kpi.formula: ( intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_prx_tot_nrt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_ptx_tot_nrt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_nrt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_res_lim_nrt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_capa_ul_nrt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_capa_dl_nrt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_prx_tot_nrt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_ptx_tot_nrt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_nrt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_res_lim_nrt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_capa_ul_nrt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_capa_dl_nrt )

kpi_info.title: Measurement started for LB ISHO NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of Load Based inter-system HHO decisions after measuring with compressed mode by UEs with NRT connection.
kpi_info.formula:
sum( IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_NRT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_NRT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_NRT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_RES_LIM_NRT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_CAPA_UL_NRT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_CAPA_DL_NRT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_NRT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_NRT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_NRT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RES_LIM_NRT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_CAPA_UL_NRT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_CAPA_DL_NRT )

kpi.kpi_alias: Measurement started for LB ISHO NRT
